artist: Decorator: François-Joseph Aloncle; Manufacturer: Sèvres Porcelain Factory
markings: 'LSL', in script; 'N', in script, to right
medium: Porcelain with enamel and gilded decoration
text: This dessert dish from the Rohan service was decorated by François-Joseph Aloncle, who was one of the Sèvres factory's principal painters of birds, flowers and animals between 1758 and 1781.
title: Dessert dish from the Rohan service
